sentences.sentence: There is a golden eagle sculpture in the church. Many strange instruments on the wall and they can make very big noise. There are many seats for people to rogation under the platform.
sentences.translation: 教堂里有个金鹰像，墙上还有很多奇怪的乐器，它们可以发出很大的声音，在演讲台下有很多供人们祈祷的座位。
